mutants.code:
def top_n_frequent_words(s, n):
    s = s.split('')
    counted_words = [(w, s.count(w)) for w in set(s)]
    counted_words.sort(key=lambda x: (-x[1], x[0]))
    return counted_words[:n]

def top_n_frequent_words(s, n):
    s = s.split(' ')
    counted_words = [(w, s.count(w)) for w in set(s)]
    counted_words.sort(key=lambda x: (+x[1], x[0]))
    return counted_words[:n]

    s = s.split(' ')
    counted_words = [(w, s.count(w)) for w in set(s)]
    counted_words.sort(key=lambda x: (-x[1], x[-1]))
    return counted_words[:n]
